statements: SELECT * FROM cancer_patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM cancer_patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, age, treatment_plan FROM cancer_patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Breast Cancer';
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, genetic_variation FROM cancer_patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis, treatment_plan FROM cancer_patients WHERE gender = 'Female' AND age < 40;
SELECT * FROM cancer_patients WHERE age > 50 ORDER BY patient_name DESC;
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis, gender FROM cancer_patients WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM cancer_patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Breast Cancer';
SELECT patient_name, age, treatment_plan FROM cancer_patients WHERE age BETWEEN 30 AND 40 ORDER BY age ASC;
SELECT patient_id, genetic_variation FROM cancer_patients WHERE treatment_plan LIKE '%chemotherapy%';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_name, age FROM patients WHERE gender='Male';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 30;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data ORDER BY report_date DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT patient_name, dna_sequence FROM patients JOIN genomic_data ON patients.patient_id = genomic_data.patient_id WHERE report_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT patient_name, age, gender FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC;
SELECT * FROM genomic_data WHERE report_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE gender = 'Male' ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT p.patient_name, g.dna_sequence FROM patients p INNER JOIN genomic_data g ON p.patient_id = g.patient_id WHERE LENGTH(g.dna_sequence) > 100;
SELECT patient_name, age, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE diagnosis LIKE '%cancer%' ORDER BY age;
SELECT * FROM patient_genomic_data;
SELECT patient_id, genomic_data FROM patient_genomic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medicine_name, target_gene FROM precision_medicine_data ORDER BY medicine_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date >= '2022-01-01' AND treatment_date <= '2022-12-31';
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date FROM treatment_history JOIN patient_genomic_data ON treatment_history.patient_id = patient_genomic_data.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM patient_genomic_data WHERE patient_id = 1;
SELECT medicine_name, target_gene FROM precision_medicine_data ORDER BY medicine_name ASC;
SELECT patient_id, treatment_date FROM treatment_history WHERE treatment_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2021-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, genomic_data FROM patient_genomic_data WHERE patient_id IN (2,4,6);

SELECT medicine_name, COUNT(*) AS num_patients FROM precision_medicine_data JOIN treatment_history ON precision_medicine_data.medicine_id = treatment_history.medicine_id GROUP BY medicine_name ORDER BY num_patients DESC;
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, date_of_birth FROM Patients WHERE gender = 'Male';
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM Samples;
SELECT sample_type, collection_date FROM Samples ORDER BY collection_date DESC;
SELECT patient_name, treatment_name, treatment_date FROM Patients JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE gender = 'Female';
SELECT * FROM Patients;
SELECT patient_name, gender FROM Patients ORDER BY date_of_birth DESC;
SELECT Samples.sample_type, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Samples JOIN Treatments ON Samples.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id;

SELECT Patients.patient_name, GenomicData.sequencing_method FROM Patients JOIN Samples ON Patients.patient_id = Samples.patient_id JOIN GenomicData ON Samples.sample_id = GenomicData.sample_id WHERE GenomicData.sequencing_method = 'WGS';

SELECT Patients.patient_name, Samples.sample_type, Treatments.treatment_name FROM Patients JOIN Samples ON Patients.patient_id = Samples.patient_id JOIN Treatments ON Patients.patient_id = Treatments.patient_id WHERE Samples.collection_date > '2020-01-01';
SELECT * FROM patients;
SELECT patient_id, patient_name, diagnosis FROM patients WHERE age > 50;
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM treatments ORDER BY treatment_start_date DESC;
SELECT d.doctor_name, d.specialization, t.treatment_type FROM doctors d JOIN treatments t ON d.doctor_id = t.patient_id;
SELECT g.gene_name, g.mutation_type, p.patient_name FROM genetic_results g JOIN patients p ON g.patient_id = p.patient_id WHERE g.mutation_impact = 'High';
SELECT patient_name, gender, age FROM patients WHERE diagnosis = 'Cancer';
SELECT * FROM genetic_results WHERE mutation_impact = 'High';
SELECT treatment_type, treatment_start_date, treatment_end_date FROM treatments WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT doctor_name, hospital_name FROM doctors WHERE specialization = 'Oncology';

SELECT patients.patient_name, treatments.treatment_type, doctors.doctor_name FROM patients INNER JOIN treatments ON patients.patient_id = treatments.patient_id INNER JOIN doctors ON treatments.patient_id = doctors.doctor_id;
